title: Innovative Social Studies Education Using AR/VR and Metaverse Technologies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and understanding of fundamental social studies concepts
context.additional_context: Experiential learning integrating social studies content with AR/VR/metaverse in a digital device-supported environment, with a focus on employment-linked curriculum design.

learning_goals: Analyze and explain causal relationships of social phenomena with over 80% accuracy using AR/VR-based simulations.
Complete at least three team-based social problem-solving projects using collaboration tools in a metaverse platform.
Achieve a 25% or higher improvement in learning engagement compared to traditional education through digital record analysis.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
